name: THE RIVER RUNS THROUGH US (Pt. 1)
description:
A tragedy sleeps in the hiking trails and run-down mills of Western Massachusetts. It lays dormant in the collective folk memory — but not for long. Play as Camlin, a 20-something year old college student who begins to hear the sounds of a centuries-old flood through their audio equipment. Read along and make key choices in this sound novel to help Camlin unravel the mystery of the 1874 Mill River Flood.

Will you hold the guilty accountable?

Inspired by Night of the Kamaitachi, Oxenfree, An Outcry, and Night in the Woods.

Made by A. Blaustein, DavidRodMad (@davidrodmad), Luca Fisher (@lucanfisher), and Quinn K. (@QuinnPixelArt).

Check out the game's original soundtrack on Quinn's bandcamp page: https://toqlumsilytumble.bandcamp.com/album/sounds-from-the-riverbed-the-river-r...
